attributes.action: reverse the recently introduced supplement of £15 to all fines imposed by the Courts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government has recently introduced a supplement of £15 to fines imposed by the Courts in all cases where offences are committed on or after 1 April. This is said to be with a view to raising funds to improve victim support in cases of domestic violence. This worthwhile aim should be funded  out of general taxation and by getting those who commit motoring offences and other minor offences to pay more is contrary to the rules of natural justice, or would be if they existed any longer! There are plans to extend the scheme to fixed penalty notices which will only increase the injustice
